Actually upon looking at it again, what I said earlier isn't the case.

When you create a FastNetwork, it sets numConstantNodes, which defines all
nodes in the range [0,numConstantNodes) to be input nodes.  Then it only
runs the activation function on nodes in the range [numConstantNodes,inf).

Let me know if there is a bug in that logic, but it looks like the input
nodes should not have an activation function called on them.

Jason G.

--bcaec553ffc08e306004cba805d9
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
